content.text: From the table above, find out the value of b

solution.text:
\(b = \frac 1{_{j}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow\) Since X and Y are inversely proportional XY = k
\(\Rightarrow\) Therefore, \((b) \times (20 \times (_{j}_^2)) = 10 \times a\)
\(\Rightarrow\) From previous subpart, \(a = 2 \times _{j}_\)
\(\Rightarrow\) b =\( \frac {20 \times _{j}_}{(20 \times (_{j}_^2))}\)
\(\Rightarrow\) b = _{{1/j}}_
